verbose_text: Inhibition the IFNalphaR2/JAK1/STAT1 signaling pathway resulted in massive downregulation of antiviral ISGs, including MX1, CH25H, and IFITMs (inhibitors of virus entry) and APOBEC3G, OAS1, ISG15, and IFI44L (suppressors of virus translation and replication).
evidence: APOBEC3G, OAS1, ISG15, and IFI44L (suppressors of virus translation
